message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.SY 

The paper deals with online learning and optimization, which are core topics in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Specifically, it focuses on the problem of minimizing adaptive regret for convex functions, which is a common objective in online convex optimization. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also utilizes techniques from decision theory and information theory, which are relevant to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.IT (Information Theory). Finally, the paper deals with changing environments, which is a topic in control theory and robotics, making cs.SY (Systems and Control) a possible sub-category as well.
